mapper.select: select a.* from ma_wf_act_lcphase a order by a.dataseq
select a.* from ma_wf_act_lcphase a where guid = #GUID#
mapper.insert:
insert into ma_wf_act_lcphase ( guid, MAWFACTFK, LCMASTERGUID, FROMLCPHASEGUID, TOLCPHASEGUID, dataseq, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid ) values ( #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MAWFACTFK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #LCMASTERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FROMLCPHASEGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TOLCPHASEGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATASEQ#,
#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
update ma_wf_act_lcphase
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, MAWFACTFK=#MAWFACTFK#, LCMASTERGUID=#LCMASTERGUID#, DATASEQ=#DATASEQ#, fromlcphaseguid=#FROMLCPHASEGUID#, tolcphaseguid=#TOLCPHASEGUID#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
